entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
